item.title: Gaza food aid scarce after Israel halts entry
item.description: The UN said at least 80 community kitchens may run out of stock, and remaining food rations will soon run dry.

item.title: Zelensky's conciliatory letter to Trump suggests he's run out of road
item.description: The Ukrainian leader's climb-down on security guarantees may be because the US is the only place he can turn to, writes BBC Ukraine correspondent Jame...

item.title: Canada foreign minister takes Trump 51st state line 'very seriously'
item.description: MÃ©lanie Joly told the BBC "this is not a joke" and said Canada would "fight" against Trump tariffs.

item.title: Lesotho shocked by Trump's remarks that 'nobody has heard of the country'
item.description: Lesotho says it is surprised by Trump's comments given its "warm and cordial" relations with the US.

item.title: Many feared dead in Sudan after shelling hits crowded market
item.description: The market, in a camp for displaced people, was attacked for roughly two hours, a local official says.
